body.p: Catalyst is a framework for building web applications, which will run on Application Lifecycle Service. To learn more about Catalyst, see the Catalyst documentation. Also, take a look at the Application Lifecycle Service sample apps listed below to see some working code examples.

section.title: Home Directory
section.p: Catalyst makes different assumptions on its Home directory depending on whether or not it is installed in @INC. It makes this distinction based on the presence of a Makefile.PL or BUILD.PL file in the app directory, so it is important to have one even if all prerequisites are installed via requirements.txt.
Alternatively, the Home directory can be set explicitly with environment variables. For example, you could set CATALYST_HOME in manifest.yml:
